name: ParseTest
description: Integration tests for parsing HTML documents using Jsoup.

test_cases.name: testHtml5Charset
test_cases.description: Tests the detection and application of HTML5 charset meta tags.

test_cases.name: testBrokenHtml5CharsetWithASingleDoubleQuote
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of broken HTML5 charset meta tags with a single double quote.

test_cases.name: testLowercaseUtf8Charset
test_cases.description: Tests the detection and application of lowercase UTF-8 charset meta tags.

test_cases.name: testXwiki
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a specific XWiki document, ensuring correct handling of buffer marks.

test_cases.name: testXwikiExpanded
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a specific XWiki document with expanded content, ensuring correct handling of buffer marks and error tracking.

test_cases.name: testWikiExpandedFromString
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a specific XWiki document from a string, ensuring correct handling of buffer marks.

test_cases.name: testWikiFromString
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a specific XWiki document from a string, ensuring correct handling of buffer marks.

test_cases.name: testFileParseNoCharsetMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a file without specifying a charset, ensuring default charset handling.
